articles.author: Darragh Fox
articles.title: Manchester United consider Matthijs de Ligt as alternative to Jarrad Branthwaite - Man United News And Transfer News - The Peoples Person
articles.description: Manchester United will reportedly consider an approach for Bayern Munich defender Matthijs de Ligt should their pursuit of Jarrad Branthwaite fall through. The Red Devils tabled an offer worth in the region of £45 million for the English defender but this was…
articles.content:
7Manchester United will reportedly consider an approach for Bayern Munich defender Matthijs de Ligt should their pursuit of Jarrad Branthwaite fall through.
